articles.title: 3 Americans found dead at Sandals Emerald Bay Bahamas resort - New York Post
articles.description: Three Americans were found dead in the luxury resort in the Bahamas, and a fourth was airlifted to a hospital, according to authorities.
articles.content:

articles.title: Helicopter catches space rocket booster - The Mercury
articles.description:
The American-New Zealand company Rocket Lab has taken a big step forward in its quest to reuse its launch vehicles – by catching one – as it fell back to Earth.

A helicopter grabbed the booster mid-air as it parachuted back towards the Pacific Ocean.
